product_name: The North Face Sickline Shell Jacket - Men's
long_description: In pursuit of the sickest lines? The North Face Sickline shell jacket rises to the challenge with Gore-Tex(R) Pro 3-layer protection and lightweight, tough construction for lasting performance. Gore-Tex(R) Pro 3-layer construction delivers excellent waterproof, windproof and highly breathable protection to keep you dry and comfortable, even in harsh conditions. Embedded RECCO(R) reflector enhances radio signals from search-and-rescue RECCO detectors, helping speed up the search for a buried avalanche victim. Externally accessed, weather-resistant zippered chest pocket has an elastic loop to keep your two-way radio secure and easily accessible. Flap-covered zip handwarmer pockets; wrist pocket (with goggles cloth); internal insulated, weather-resistant cell phone pocket; internal goggles pocket; internal stash pocket. Offset center YKK Aquaguard Vislon zipper boasts a new tooth design that's integrated with a polyurethane-laminated tape for excellent weather resistance. Powder skirt helps seal out cold air and snow entry; clip-in tabs let you connect the powder skirt to compatible pants (sold separately) for an integrated, protective barrier. Pit-zip vents let you dump excess heat and provide cooling ventilation. Helmet-compatible, adjustable hood offers excellent peripheral vision. The North Face Sickline jacket has a drawcord hem and rip-and-stick cuffs to keep snow out and retain warmth; cuffs have thumb loops to help keep sleeves from riding up.
